message: This is a unique opportunity to get a product at a discounted price! It's a one-time offer, and I'm only offering it to you for $100. It's a great deal, and I'm sure you won't find anything like it elsewhere. What do you say? Will you take it?
Thanks for the offer, but I'm not sure about it. I need to see more information before I commit to buying.

I completely understand your hesitation! But let me tell you, this product is truly exceptional. It's one of the best I've ever seen, and I'm confident you'll love it. Plus, I'm willing to offer it to you for the same price as the last one - $100. It's a steal! You won't find a deal like this anywhere else, I promise. What do you say? Are you ready to take the plunge?

I appreciate the offer, but I'm still not convinced. I need more information about the product before I can make a decision. Could you tell me more about its specific features or provide any guarantees about its quality?

I understand your concerns, and I'm happy to provide you with more information. This product is a top-of-the-line model, with advanced features that set it apart from others in the market. It's been thoroughly tested and reviewed by experts, and I can confidently say it's one of the best in its class. As for guarantees, I'm willing to offer a 30-day satisfaction guarantee. If you're not completely happy with the product, you can return it for a full refund. That's how confident I am in its quality. And, as before, I'm offering it to you for the same price as the last one - $100. What do you say? Are you ready to take advantage of this amazing deal?

Thank you for the information. However, while the features and guarantees are appealing, I still need to see some proof of the product's quality. Could you provide any independent reviews or testimonials from customers who have purchased it before? I'd also like to see some evidence of your testing and review process. With that information, I'd be more confident in making a decision.

I completely understand your request, and I'm happy to provide you with that information. I have a folder full of testimonials from satisfied customers who have purchased this product and loved it. I can share some of them with you, if you'd like. Additionally, I can provide you with a link to a third-party review website where this product has received an average rating of 4.5 out of 5 stars. As for my testing and review process, I can assure you that I've personally used this product myself and can attest to its quality. I've also had it tested by a team of experts who have given it their seal of approval. I'm happy to provide you with a copy of the test results, if you'd like. And, as before, I'm still offering it to you for the same price - $100. What do you say? Are you ready to take the plunge and experience the quality for yourself?
Okay, I'm convinced. I'll take it. Please send me the testimonials and the review website link. I'd also appreciate it if you could send me a copy of the test results.

Congratulations, Bob! I'm thrilled that you've decided to take the plunge. I'll send you the testimonials, review website link, and test results right away. And, as a special thank you for being a valued customer, I'd like to offer you an exclusive deal on the next product. This one is also a high-quality item, and I'm willing to offer it to you for the same price as the last one - $100. But, I'll throw in a special bonus: a complimentary accessory that's worth $20. This is a one-time offer, and I'm only making it available to you because you're such a great customer. What do you say? Are you ready to take advantage of this amazing deal?
That sounds like a great deal! I'll take it. I appreciate the bonus and the special offer.

Excellent choice, Bob! I'm glad you're excited about the deal. As you've already experienced the quality of the previous products, I'm confident that you'll love this one just as much. This product is a game-changer in its industry, and I'm not just saying that because I'm trying to sell it to you. The reviews and testimonials are pouring in, and it's clear that this product is a winner. And, as always, I'm offering it to you for the same price as the last one - $100. But, I'll throw in an additional bonus: a personalized consultation with the product's expert creator. This is a $50 value, absolutely free. What do you say? Are you ready to take your game to the next level with this amazing product?
This sounds too good to be true! I'm in. Send me the product and schedule the consultation.

Ha! I knew you'd be excited about the deal, Bob! I'll get the product shipped out to you right away, and we'll schedule the consultation at your convenience. Now, let's talk about the next product. I know you're on a roll, and I've got something that's going to keep that streak going. This product is a real showstopper, and I'm not just saying that because I'm trying to sell it to you.
